name: Proslat WallMax Pro Panels
description: This Proslat wall solution features Proslat's patented PVC wall panels and offers the versatility of having individual panels installed as a track, in a section or over an entire wall. Proslat wall panels are up to 25 times more impact-resistant than drywall, unaffected by mold, mildew and water, so they can be used in damp locations where drywall and wood might absorb the humidity.Weight capacity of 75 lbs. per linear ft. and 1,000 lbs. per section (when evenly distributed)90% recycled polyethylene materialTen 8 ft. wall panels for storing all your tools safely and securelyEasy installationEasy cleanup with just a damp cloth or hoseUnique hidden screw design for a professional finishTrims and mounting screws includedAbility to fit most standard peg board and slat wall hooks and accessories, allowing you to upgrade over time
